def_cn: 咖喱菜(印度主要菜肴，常与米饭一起食用)
def_en: Curry is a dish composed of meat and vegetables, or just vegetables, in a sauce containing hot spices. It is usually eaten with rice and is one of the main dishes of India.
If one person tries to curry favour with another, they do things in order to try to gain their support or co-operation.
